titleInfo.title: Heavy Weight Songwriters Extravaganza in Greensville

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) Hatch poster announcing the Heavy Weight Songwriters Extravaganza featuring Lucinda Williams, Steve Young, Bo Ramsey, and R. B. Morris at the Phesant Cafe in Greensville on April 26.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
